name: Spiking Dash
description:
Keep the life of your walking spike safe as much as you can.

Prevent your character from falling into the hole by staying on the platforms. Control the strength of your jumps with a tap pressed on the screen, if you see it fall, tap the screen to land.

  • The game has a total of 9 levels, at each level the platforms are getting smaller.
  • Share your high score with Google Play Games rankings.
  • Simple one touch controls.
  • Languages available in Spanish, Portuguese and English.
  • Procedural platforms, backgrounds and visuals.
  • Infinite runner style.
